page.title: 063rd Clapham Brownie Pack
page.content: We have our Brownie Pack in the school hall. Julia, Faye and lots more people do it. There are two adults. We call them Brown Owl and Tawny. When we get to Brownies we play games. We have to wear a uniform with a hat and a badge which is made of silver metal. We play games like "We went to the old Kentucky, the old Kentucky Fair". I have got a badge about First Aid. We had to have a model and blow into it to sew if we could do it. The model was called an artificial rescussitation Anne. We had a test to see if we could make cups of tea. And we all had to get enrolled before we could be Brownies. We were first called Tweens before we were Brownies. There is a time when you get enrolled and then you are a Brownie like me.
